author: Mandy
title: Pornography Prayer Points with Scriptures: 100+ Deliverance Prayers to Break Free
text:
Pornography addiction is a silent battle that many people face, often in secrecy. It weakens your spiritual life, distorts your mind, and keeps you in a cycle of guilt and shame. But there is hope! Through the power of prayer and the Word of God, you can break free from pornography and reclaim your purity.
In this guide, you’ll find 100+ powerful pornography prayer points with scriptures to help you overcome this addiction. If you are ready to experience complete deliverance, start praying these prayers today!
Pornography Prayer Points with Scriptures: 100+ Deliverance Prayers to Break Free “If the Son sets you free, you will be free indeed.” – John 8:36
Understanding Pornography Addiction Why Pornography is Dangerous Pornography is more than just a bad habit—it’s a spiritual battle that affects your mind, body, and soul. Here’s why it’s dangerous:
It enslaves you spiritually ( John 8:34 – “Everyone who sins is a slave to sin.” ) It damages your relationships ( Proverbs 5:3-5 – “The lips of a forbidden woman drip honey, but in the end, she is bitter as wormwood.” ) It corrupts your thoughts ( Romans 12:2 – “Be transformed by the renewing of your mind.” ) It blocks your prayers ( Isaiah 59:2 – “Your sins have hidden His face from you so that He will not hear.” ) If you are struggling, you need deliverance prayers that will break every bondage of pornography in your life.
How to Pray for Deliverance from Pornography Here are five steps to effective prayers for freedom:
Confess your struggle to God ( 1 John 1:9 – “If we confess our sins, He is faithful to forgive us.” ) Ask for forgiveness & cleansing ( Psalm 51:10 – “Create in me a clean heart, O God.” ) Declare freedom over your life ( Galatians 5:1 – “It is for freedom that Christ has set us free.” ) Replace lustful thoughts with the Word of God ( Colossians 3:2 – “Set your minds on things above, not earthly things.” ) Fast and pray for a breakthrough ( Isaiah 58:6 – “Is not this the fast that I have chosen: to loose the chains of wickedness?” ) Pornography Prayer Points with Scriptures: 100+ Deliverance Prayers to Break Free 100+ Powerful Pornography Prayer Points with Scriptures Prayers for Repentance & Cleansing Lord, I repent of my sins and ask for Your cleansing power ( 1 John 1:9 ). Father, wash me with the blood of Jesus and purify my heart ( Psalm 51:7 ). Jesus, set me free from every stronghold of pornography ( John 8:36 ). Holy Spirit, convict my heart whenever I am tempted ( John 16:8 ). Lord, renew my mind and make me holy ( Romans 12:2 ). Prayers for Breaking Soul Ties with Pornography By the blood of Jesus, I break every ungodly soul tie to pornography ( 2 Corinthians 6:17 ). Lord, disconnect me from all lustful desires in Jesus’ name ( Matthew 5:8 ). I renounce every agreement I have made with lust ( Job 31:1 ). Father, break every demonic attachment to pornography in my life ( Isaiah 10:27 ). I reject every spirit of addiction and perversion in Jesus’ name ( 1 Corinthians 6:18 ). Prayers for Renewing the Mind & Purity Father, renew my mind with Your Word daily ( Romans 12:2 ). Jesus, help me set my mind on things above ( Colossians 3:2 ). Lord, let my thoughts be pure and holy ( Philippians 4:8 ). Holy Spirit, fill my heart with righteousness ( Matthew 5:6 ). I declare that my body is the temple of the Holy Spirit ( 1 Corinthians 6:19 ). Prayers for Strength to Overcome Temptation Lord, strengthen me to resist temptation ( 1 Corinthians 10:13 ). I put on the whole armor of God to fight against lust ( Ephesians 6:11 ). Jesus, give me grace to say no to ungodliness ( Titus 2:11-12 ). Holy Spirit, lead me away from every source of temptation ( Matthew 6:13 ). I take authority over every unclean spirit in Jesus’ name ( Luke 10:19 ). Midnight Prayers for Deliverance from Pornography Every spirit fueling lust in my life, I cast you out in Jesus’ name! I break every chain of addiction holding me captive! Lord, let Your fire consume every evil desire in me. I receive the power to walk in holiness. Jesus, deliver me from every secret sin. Prayers for Overcoming Shame and Guilt Lord, remove every shame that pornography has brought into my life ( Isaiah 61:7 ). Jesus, remind me that I am forgiven and set free ( Romans 8:1 ). Father, help me to walk in the confidence of Your love ( Hebrews 4:16 ). I declare that I am not my past; I am a new creation ( 2 Corinthians 5:17 ). Holy Spirit, fill me with joy and restoration ( Psalm 51:12 ). Prayers for Total Deliverance and Victory Lord, let Your light shine in every dark area of my life.
I declare that I am free from pornography forever ( Galatians 5:1 ).
Lord, surround me with Your protection against temptation ( Psalm 91:2-4 ).
Jesus, be the Lord over my thoughts and desires ( 2 Corinthians 10:5 ).
Holy Spirit, empower me to live a life of purity ( 1 Peter 1:15-16 ).
Father, I thank You for complete deliverance and freedom ( John 8:36 ).
Lord, I surrender my desires completely to You.
Father, let the fire of the Holy Spirit purify my heart and mind.
Jesus, remove every corrupt thought from my life.
I declare that lust and addiction shall no longer control me.
Lord, break every cycle of failure and relapse in my life.
Father, fill me with the fruit of the Spirit, especially self-control.
Holy Spirit, be my guide in every thought and decision.
I rebuke every satanic manipulation designed to lure me into sin.
Jesus, let my focus be set on things above and not on earthly desires.
Lord, establish me in righteousness so that I may not fall again.
I renounce every agreement made with the enemy through sinful habits.
Father, break every generational curse of sexual immorality in my family.
Jesus, let Your presence in my life overshadow every temptation.
Lord, let the blood of Jesus cleanse my mind from every impurity.
Holy Spirit, renew my thought patterns and fill them with Your Word.
Father, remove every association or friendship that tempts me into sin.
Lord, I disconnect from any environment that encourages impurity.
Jesus, release me from every spiritual bondage connected to pornography.
I declare my body as a living sacrifice, holy and acceptable to God.
Father, empower me to be a testimony of deliverance and purity.
I break every cycle of addiction and temptation in Jesus’ name.
Lord, renew my thoughts with purity and holiness.
I reject every deceptive thought that leads me into sin.
Holy Spirit, be my comfort and strength during moments of weakness.
Jesus, let my desires align with Your will.
Lord, fill my heart with love for righteousness.
I declare that my life is dedicated to holiness and purity.
Father, silence every voice of temptation in my mind.
I overcome every battle against pornography in Jesus’ name.
Lord, grant me wisdom to recognize and flee from all traps of the enemy.
Holy Spirit, guard my heart against impurity.
Jesus, renew my spirit and lead me into purity.
Father, remove every stronghold of the enemy in my life.
I reject every temptation that comes my way today and forever.
How to Maintain Deliverance from Pornography Delete all triggers (websites, social media, apps, etc.). Join an accountability group (Proverbs 27:17). Fast and pray regularly (Isaiah 58:6). Replace addiction with positive habits (Colossians 3:10). Stay connected to God through daily prayer & Bible study (Psalm 1:2-3).
